verses.name: Ezekiel 33:16
verses.text: None of his sins that he hath committed shall be mentioned unto him: he hath done that which is lawful and right; he shall surely live.

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:17
verses.text: Yet the children of thy people say, The way of the Lord is not equal: but as for them, their way is not equal.

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:18
verses.text: When the righteous turneth from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, he shall even die thereby.

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:19
verses.text: But if the wicked turn from his wickedness, and do that which is lawful and right, he shall live thereby.
